method.name: GET
method.doc: Returns the list of attributes configured for an objectclass . This API is used in conjunction with form template REST API. The forms contain widgets in which the object class is configured by System Administrator.
This object class is returned by "form tempalate" REST API in an encrypted format. The API decrypts this object class and returns the list of attributes.

param.name: com.ibm.isim.rest.accesstoken
param.doc: This mandatory header parameter contains the encrypted object class whose attributes are to be listed. This token will be generated by the "form template" REST API.
